objectives: Students will discuss hobbies and free time using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to hobbies and free time
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining hobbies and free time content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore hobbies and free time through a Romance lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving hobbies and free time

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to hobbies and free time in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about hobbies and free time using neutral register
Students create original romance themed content about hobbies and free time in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe hobbies and free time in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in hobbies and free time?
Can you create a Romance story about hobbies and free time?
How does hobbies and free time change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving hobbies and free time
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in romance context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within romance theme

topic_genre_blend: hobbies and free time with heart
hobbies and free time with passion
hobbies and free time with affection

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
